about.title: About MyxoFlow
about.subtitle: Transforming businesses through unified dashboard technology
about.story: Founded in 2023, MyxoFlow was born from the realization that businesses needed a unified approach to market expansion. Instead of building separate solutions for each vertical, we created a platform that adapts to any market while maintaining consistency and shared optimization benefits.
about.mission: To democratize business optimization by providing unified technology that scales across any market vertical.

team.title: Built by developers, for businesses
